9 Health Domains

The Shape of 21st Century Health, Wealth & Wellness.

9 Health Domains

The 9 Domains & 56 Processes of the Humaucracy Care System. Humaucracy recognizes the variety of influences on your health. We thus help you optimize your Health by addressing 9 areas.

Finally, each Domain comes with its corresponding theme known as its Perfection. Think of a Domain's perfection as the essential guiding character of each Domain. Each perfection serves as the tenor, tone & theme to actualizing each of the Domains & Processes health objectives.

Cognition • Mindfulness

Do you ever recall a MD actively listen while talking with you thru your ideas about your health? Likely not because med schools train doctors to diagnose you as a patient with a disease, not as a knowledgeable person or an intelligent source of a healthy solution. The Humaucracy Care System discards medicine's worn-out disease approach to health & healing. It doesn't lecture or belittle you. Rather, Humaucracy seeks to inform you, to promote your health mastery. Our health professionals see you as the captains of your own health life. We provide you the sound guidance, unbiased coaching and the superior HCS playbook to make you a wiser, healthier person.

Whats On Your Mind?

Sex • Compassion

Even with medical doctors, we are frequently made to feel uneasy discussing our sexual/reproductive health. Too often to our detriment, sex is allowed to lurk in the shadows, abetted by pious shame & abuse, then obscured by common confusion. Humaucracy acknowledges sexual health as a basic, positive component of our human lives. The Humaucracy Care System correctly concretely places sex where it belongs: within a serious, neutral context of healthy living. The HCS guides and grants you authority over your sexual health by fixing it into a clear comprehensive, positive framework of Humaucracy's 9 Domains of human health & wellness.

Do You Use Oral Contraceptives?

Health • Discipline

Does your current insurance health insurance plan only get involved when you are sick, then leave you with a bill, a lecture and/or a charge towards a high deductible? Humaucracy focuses on preserving your health instead of intervening only when you're ill. It explains how to avoid illness then gives you the tools to stay healthy whenever possible, not just the bad times. We are your health collaborator, the coach who sees you thru all the times off your life.

Are You Feeling Well?

Money • Wisdom

Have you lost sleep lately over paying bills? Have fights over money sabotaged your loving relationships? For many of us the answer to these questions is yes. The daily reality of being 'money sick' undermines the health of both individuals & communities. Yet, no present health insurance system with the medical practitioners who work for them take this fact of life seriously into account. Only, Humaucracy recognizes money as integral to our overall wellness. Only the HCS' matter-of-fact health focus on optimizing our wealth, work life & general prosperity contribute essentially to our long-term well-being.

How Are Your Finances?

You • Individual

The principle Domain of Humaucracy is the Individual. You are the 9th Domain. Each unique individual constitutes the essential living human being the dynamic Humaucracy Care System exists to bolster, promote & sustain. There is no doubt why Humaucracy is here. There is no conflict of interest. It serves no outside actor, no hidden agenda or scheme. The Individual is the center of the HCS; your achievement serves as the sole measure of our success. The HCS brings a complete 21st century understanding of human health, organizes it clearly for everyone and offers it to benefit you for life.

What Makes You Tick?

Diet • Energy

We've heard the expression, "You Are What You Eat." The truth here is that eating well is essential to living well. Clearly, a healthy diet provides a foundation for a healthy life, but when was the last time your doctor took the time to provide sound guidance about the food you eat? Or, when did a doctor listen enough to collaborate with you to develop a program of eating well. They don't; rather doctors are trained to treat diseases that make you sick. Insurance companies employ doctors to provide medicine as remedies to treat the symptoms of diseases caused by poor eating habits they ignore. Basically, they don't profit from patients who are well from eating right.

What Are You Eating?

Stress / Illness • Entropy

Experienced Health Practitioners understand that stress is the root cause of disease. Uncontrolled stress undermines health, saps our vitality while it sabotages our quality of life. The Humaucracy Care System excels at managing the chronic diseases that afflict us. Yes, everybody gets sick occasionally. When you are ill, no need to get stressed out. You can count on Humaucracy's trained, licensed health professionals to treat your illness and compassionately nurse you back to health.

Who Is Managing Your Diabetes?

Community • Generosity

We all understand that people belong to communities of neighbors. Clearly, the health of the community we live in impacts our personal health. Humaucracy takes the stance that strengthening the health of individuals strengthens the health of the communities they belong to. The HCS is the only health delivery model that provides the means to improve the health, wealth & well-being of both.

How's The Neighborhood?

Emotion • Patience

How do feel about the care you are getting today? Who provides support & sustenance for your emotional health? Despite the fact that emotional well being underpins our overall health, too often emotion doesn't receive the focused attention it deserves. The Humaucracy Care System recognizes the centrality of emotionality in our lives, clearly highlighting human feeling into a complete program of healthy living.

How Are You Feeling?
